# `init-req-tracking`

Initialize git tracking metadata for all requirement markdown files

## Usage

```bash
sc init-req-tracking -n, --dry-run -v, --verbose -f, --force -p, --pattern <pattern>
```

## Examples

```bash
sc init-req-tracking
```

```bash
sc init-req-tracking --dry-run --verbose
```

```bash
sc init-req-tracking --pattern '**/my-reqs/*.md'
```

```bash
sc init-tracking --force --verbose
```

## Category

**General**
